short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick access button to the history page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple shortcut to open the history page of chrome.

The Chrome extension I have developed provides a convenient shortcut for users to access their browsing history without the need to navigate through multiple menus. This extension is designed to save users valuable time, eliminating the need for them to search through various options to find their browsing history.

With a simple click of a button, users can quickly and easily access their browsing history page. This extension is perfect for individuals who frequently need to reference their browsing history or who want to maintain a better record of their internet activity.

By using this extension, users can easily monitor their internet usage and view their browsing history at any time. The extension is lightweight and unobtrusive, making it the perfect tool for users who value convenience and ease of use.
